#define sc(n) scanf("%d",&n);
#define scll(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
#define scl(n) scanf("%ld",&n);
#define pf(n) printf("%d",n);
#define pfl(n) printf("%ld",n);
#define pfll(n) printf("%lld",n);
#define newline printf("\n");
#define sc_char(n) scanf("%c",&n);
#define pf_char(n) printf("%c",n);
using namespace std;
 	long long a[600000],b[600000];
int main()
{
 int t;
 sc(t);
 while(t--)
 {
 	long long n;
 	scll(n);

 	for(long long i=0;i<n;i++)
 		scll(a[i]);
 	for(long long  i=0;i<n;i++)
 		scll(b[i]);
 	long long target;
 	scll(target);
 	 long long min=999999999999999999LL;
 	 long long index=-1;
            for(long long i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                long long  count=1,diff;
                diff=a[i]-b[i];
                long long temp=a[i];
                while(a[i]<target)
                {
               	    a[i]=a[i]+diff;
                    count++;
                }
                diff=a[i]-target;
                long long res=count*temp+(count-1)*b[i]-diff;
                // pfll(res);
                // newline
                if(i==0)
                {
                    min=res;
                    index=i;
                }
                else
                {
                    if(res<min){
                        min=res;
                        index=i;
                    }
                }
            }
 		pfll(index+1)
 		newline
 }
 		
    return 0;
}
